name: redpilled
description:
redpilled | chronicle of an incel foretold.

***

Algorithms don't care about your feelings. Do you?

After another long day, you come back to the comfort of your computer. Maybe opening up Melody's instagram one more time isn't the most healthy thing to do - but then again - so is ignoring her existence, right?

You're not like that. One of those guys. You're better.
There is no pipeline. There never was, and you're going to prove it.

Good luck. You'll need it.

***

Designed by Tuval Wolf

Art by DALL·E

Music by Sam Gendel, Tim Hecker & Radiohead

Guidance: Dani Bacon, Rutu Modan

Art & Interaction Class, Bezalel VC 2023
